title: Basic Authentication Setup
description: Implement JWT-based authentication, login/logout functionality, authentication middleware, and error handling for invalid tokens.

title: User Registration
description: Develop a registration form with email verification, secure password storage using hashing, and initial role assignment (student/mentor).

title: User Profiles
description: Enable users to create and edit profiles, upload profile pictures, and set preferences for notifications.

title: Study Room Creation
description: Develop functionality for users to create virtual study rooms, set topics, invite participants, and schedule sessions.

title: Study Room Management
description: Allow users to view ongoing/archived rooms, search and filter rooms by topic, and manage room settings (e.g., privacy, rules).

title: Real-Time Chat
description: Integrate a real-time chat system for study rooms, support text formatting, and enable file sharing.

title: Quiz Feature
description: Develop a quiz creation tool for mentors, support multiple question types, time limits, and automatic grading.

title: Dashboard Analytics
description: Provide users with insights like time spent in rooms, completed quizzes, and areas for improvement.

title: Performance Optimization
description: Improve database query efficiency, implement caching for frequently accessed data, and optimize API response times.
